credit_line: Gift of George W. George, Class of 1941
title: Study of orthodox men, boy and sheik
inscriptions: l.l. typed on sheet: ORTHODOX JEWS COVER THEIR FACES WHEN WE TRY TO TAKE/ A SNAPSHOT; l.r. typed on sheet: AN ORTHODOX BOY WEARING THE TINY SKULL CAPE AND SIDEBURNS/ REQUIRED IN HIS RELIGIOUS TRAINING; verso l.r. in pencil: 64[encircled]
